title: I proclaime from the lord of hosts the returne of the Jewes from their captivity, and the building of the temple in glory, and in their owne land.
author: Tany, Thomas, fl. 1649-1655.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Charles Sumptner for Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at the Black-spread-Eagle, at the West-end of Paules,
